#summary A combobox that shows a HTreeView as a popup

= Introduction =

A easy to use combobox with a treeview inside


[http://lh4.ggpht.com/fr.daniil/SDrjCtKf7XI/AAAAAAAAADA/q1RITVqwA1M/gtk-combo-tree.jpg]


= Details =

Example:
{{{
   HTreeNode root   = new HTreeNode( "gigi1" );
   combobox.Tree.Nodes.Add( root );
			
   root.Nodes.Add( new HTreeNode( "gigi2" ) );
   root.Nodes.Add( new HTreeNode( "gigi3" ) );
   root.Nodes.Add( new HTreeNode( "gigi4" ) );

}}}
see the wiki for the HTreeView [http://code.google.com/p/holly-gtk-widgets/wiki/HTreeView here] for more info.
